comments.body:
Add a comment regarding when should I add my custom type here and when should I add an OpenAPIDefinition() method. Maybe keep this method only for Go types and say that we need to add method for custom types?
For ex: for intOrString, I could have added it to this map instead of adding the OpenAPIDefinition() method as done in this PR, right?

tried my best to explain in the comment, but simply, decision of not adding intOrString here was to keep the type and property documentation in the spec. if we add it here, the type documentation will be gone as we will have a simple type,format,doc (that doc is the property documentation).

Good to know that. Hadnt realised it from reading the code.
Thanks for adding the comment.
